name: Hyper on Heroku
description: A barebones Python app to Publish Hyper Files to Server/Online

hyper_name.description: The name of the .hyper file to create and publish.

project_name.description: Name (not ID) for the Project you wish to publish to.

server_address.description: URL of Tableau Server/Online, for example: https://10ax.online.tableau.com/

site_id.description: ID of the site you wish to publish to.

token_name.description: Name of the PAT used for Tableau Auth

rest_url.description: The full GET request you want to gather data from.

headers.description: Optional headers instead of passing in API token in URL. Structure like a dict saved as a str.

json_object.description: Picks the main part of the JSON object to pull data from.
